name: Bufo,is that you?
description:
I was working on some art when I decided to share this with a dear friend and we began talking about our bufo ceremony experience and how 5-MeO-DMT gave us a greater perspective and innerstanding of this reality we call life. Bufo come from the bufo alvarius toad and can be a very powerful psychedelic experience. Please do research when diving into this kind of awareness and practice. 
Psychedelic experiences are connected to our consciousness and our perception of what we experience and take inward and absorb in this light dimension. Psychedelic experiences tap into subconscious tetherings of what we perceive, allowing cognitive glimpss of a less restricted mind due to self beliefs and ideology that we hold tru withing us. Research has shown that therapy with certain psychedelics/substances can produce significant results with enabling new thought pattern and potentially repairing neurological imbalances caused by trauma conditioned over time.
